        public <R,E extends Exception> R executeWithClientForResult(@Nullable OidcTokenId oidcTokenId,
                                                            ThrowingFunction<String,R,E> function,
                                                            Predicate<Exception> tokenRefreshEvaluator)
                                                     throws E extends Exception
        Execute a ThrowingFunction, handling the OAuth2 token.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the result object type
        E - the thrown exception type
        Parameters:
        oidcTokenId - the token ID
        function - the ThrowingFunction
        tokenRefreshEvaluator - function evaluating whether a refresh token needs to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the ThrowingFunction result
        Throws:
        E - the exception thrown by the ThrowingFunction
        E extends Exception
